title: G-SHOCK X COMPLEX : Black Scale
description:
Black Scale may have been born on the West Coast, but when your fundamental aesthetic is black and white, you were made for NYC. Black Scale has had a brick and mortar presence in New York for five years now, and according to the brand’s creative director, Mega, Black Scale has transformed and matured during its NYC tenure.

Trends on the street will always inspire fashion, and the simple monochromatic of G-SHOCK’s black & white series delivers high contrast and a look that’s always on point, but New York City has a unique vertical influence, as well. We took Mega on a helicopter flight over Manhattan, so we could better appreciate the full scope, contrast and, well, scale of the city.

asset.description:

asset.author: gshockus

transcripts: My name is Mega, and I'm the creative director of Black Scale for the four elements of Black Scale are birth, government, identity, and death. The first five years we wanted to focus on that story line because that's what the brand was about we were learning. We took that first five years to use those elements and now we're on the stage of rebirth, we're more mature a lot older. You know as you get older the collection changes with you because you change as a person so it's a lot different today than when we first started because we've grown so much. The rebirth it's really refreshing because we get to actually change some things about the company that we didn't know when we first started. Collaborating with brands like g-shock for us is the true essence of collaborating it's nice to really really interact with their product and see if what we do can compliment what they do. G-shock is a forever brand G-shock is for everyone it's the culture that g-shock pushes forward is what we appreciate the most at Black Scale.
